About

Coming from a strong visual arts background, understanding of the user journey in digital products came naturally to me. I want to master creating highly-customized blogs and blog-powered websites, taking advantage of the robust WordPress platform and fully optimizing it.

Looking for the opportunity to learn through real time challenges.
